title: It's time for the second half! Preview, rankings, playoff odds for all 30 MLB teams
content: Who will rule the rest of the season? Here's everything you need to know coming out of the All-Star break.

title: Ex-NFLPA boss' strip club expenses face scrutiny
content: Former NFL Players Association leader Lloyd Howell Jr. resigned after an outside investigator hired by the union received documents this week showing he charged the union for two visits to strip clubs.

title: Scheffler cards 8 birdies, holds 1-shot Open lead
content: Scottie Scheffler made eight birdies on another wild afternoon of weather at Royal Portrush to build a one-shot lead at the Open Championship heading into the weekend.

title: Docs: Bettor placed 30 wagers on Rozier unders
content: A professional bettor placed 30 wagers in 46 minutes, all involving Terry Rozier in a 2023 NBA game, according to documents obtained by ESPN that reveal new details about the suspicious betting under scrutiny by federal investigators.

title: Arch to victory? Texas preseason pick to win SEC
content: Texas, with Heisman Trophy candidate Arch Manning, is the preseason pick to win the SEC over Georgia, Alabama, LSU and South Carolina.

title: Police: Noose found at Titans' new stadium site
content: A noose was found at the site of the Titans' new Nissan Stadium, according to the Metropolitan Nashville Police Department, with work stopped at the site amid an investigation.

title: Lowry hit with 2-shot Open penalty: 'Hard to take'
content: Shane Lowry was assessed a two-stroke penalty following his second round at the Open Championship on Friday after the broadcast video feed appeared to show his ball moving slightly when he took a practice swing in the rough on the 12th hole.

title: WNBA players rue 'wasted' CBA talks with league
content: Breanna Stewart and other WNBA players in Indianapolis for All-Star weekend characterized Thursday's meeting with commissioner Cathy Engelbert and ownership representatives as a "wasted opportunity."

title: Crowe gives Tigers highest-rated recruit since MPJ
content: Jason Crowe Jr., considered the No. 1 point guard in the 2026 class, announced his commitment to Missouri on Friday, becoming the Tigers' highest-ranked recruit in almost a decade.

title: 📈 Top 10 prospect rankings for all 30 MLB teams
content: Who is rising and falling in every major league farm system after the MLB draft? Kiley McDaniel digs in.

title: Five overreactions before 2025 NFL season: Commanders win NFC East? Chiefs lose AFC West?
content: Is the Bucs QB destined for a massive new contract? Will the Commanders own the NFC East? We're judging offseason overreactions.

title: WNBA All-Star: Live updates, results, analysis from Friday
content: Caitlin Clark is out, but the party in Indianapolis is on in Friday's 3-point contest and skills challenge.

title: Big Ten preview: Can Penn State finally break through? Will Ohio State repeat?
content: As the Big Ten looks to produce its third straight national champion, Bill Connelly breaks down all 18 teams.

title: NBA summer league standouts: Flagg, Harper, Hansen and surprise stars
content: From Cooper Flagg to veteran players, Kevin Pelton hands out superlatives for 2025 NBA summer league.

title: The USMNT's to-do list before the 2026 World Cup, ranked by urgency
content: The USMNT's failure at the Gold Cup makes it clear changes are needed before the 2026 World Cup. Here are the five keys, ranked by urgency.

title: Weah to Marseille, Reyna to anywhere but Dortmund? Best transfer fits for USMNT stars
content: What moves, if any, should these eight USMNT players make to ensure they'll be in top form next summer?

title: Timeline: Caitlin Clark's injury-riddled first half of the WNBA season
content: Three separate injuries have sidelined the Indiana point guard and All-Star for 10 regular-season WNBA games.

title: 14 players who could be picked No. 1 in the 2026 NFL draft
content: Which quarterback could go first overall? What about edge rusher T.J. Parker or another non-QB? Let's project the race.

title: 'We couldn't chance it': Why the Suns and Bradley Beal finally came to terms
content: One element of the Suns' roster failure has loomed: How to end their marriage to the three-time All-Star.

title: How Spain's quiet superstar, Mariona Caldentey, stepped out of the shadows
content: For much of Mariona Caldentey's career she operated in the shadows, but the decision to swap Barcelona for Arsenal has thrust her into the spotlight.

title: AFC North intrigue: Will Ravens be first to three-peat? Will Rodgers snap Tomlin's playoff skid?
content: The AFC North is loaded with intrigue and talent, from Lamar Jackson to Joe Burrow and now Aaron Rodgers. Here's what to know.

title: Chiefs QB Patrick Mahomes ready to enter new era: Turning 30
content: Mahomes has won two MVPs and three Super Bowls in his 20s. He'll turn 30 as he starts his ninth NFL season.

title: Assembling the 2028 Olympic roster for U.S. flag football: Our 10-player roster -- and one go-to play
content: We picked nine NFL players -- and one college football star -- for the U.S. Olympic flag football roster for 2028. Who would make our team?

title: Ranking the top 25 college football recruits regardless of class
content: Why let rising seniors get all the glory? We break down the best prospects in the country, including underclassmen.

title: WNBA players, coaches voice frustration over how games are called
content: Players, coaches and fans say they want greater consistency regarding how games are refereed and the level of physicality allowed.

title: Sources: Man Utd, Brentford agree Mbeumo deal
content: Manchester United are set to complete the signing of Bryan Mbeumo after agreeing a deal in excess of £70 million ($94m) with Brentford, sources have told ESPN.

title: Madueke joins Arsenal from rivals Chelsea
content: Arsenal have completed the signing of Noni Madueke from London rivals Chelsea, the clubs confirmed Friday.

title: Masche on Messi, All-Stars: 'Would prefer rest'
content: Inter Miami head coach Javier Mascherano said he would prefer that Lionel Messi and Jordi Alba not participate in the 2025 MLS All-Star Game, insisting players should be resting amid the ongoing regular season.

title: Barça delay Camp Nou return amid permit issues
content: Barcelona's planned return to Spotify Camp Nou next month was again delayed, the club announced on Friday.

title: Dempsey: USMNT must win friendlies to sway fans
content: Clint Dempsey said success on the field during friendlies over the next year would help the U.S. fill seats with fans from their own country at the World Cup next year.

title: New Spurs boss Frank jokes: 'I wanted more risk'
content: Thomas Frank has joked he left Brentford for Tottenham because he wanted "more risk" -- but insisted he will be given time to turn the club into serial trophy challengers.

title: Marta 'saddened' by conditions at Copa América
content: Brazilian players, including six-time FIFA Player of the Year Marta, have criticised CONMEBOL and the organisers of the Women's Copa América in Ecuador for requiring teams to warm up in confined indoor areas rather than on the pitch.

title: Mourinho eyes Portugal return in 'height of career'
content: Jose Mourinho has declared his desire to return to coach in his native Portugal while he is still "at the height of his career."

title: How Bo Jackson on a bicycle united Alabama after a record-breaking storm
content: The GOAT created a bike ride to help tornado-damaged Alabama. No one knew what it'd do -- or how it'd end.

title: 'Sad.' 'Embarrassing.' Why players were a no-show at the MLB draft
content: Moving the draft to All-Star week was supposed to give it some sizzle. But not one player was in attendance.

title: What it's like boxing Pacquiao, and how he can beat Barrios
content: Timothy Bradley Jr. shares his thoughts about fighting Manny Pacquiao and breaks down Saturday's fight.

title: Usyk's rhythm will be key; but there's a way for Dubois to disrupt it
content: Timothy Bradley Jr. looks at their first fight, and shares his thoughts on how the rematch could play out.

title: Week 8 preview: Key stats, players for Indigenous Weekend
content: Fairfield, Connecticut, is the host for Friday's and Saturday's games. Here's the schedule, key stats, injury notes, more.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Xavi Simons eyes Chelsea over Bayern, Barça
content: RB Leipzig attacking midfielder Xavi Simons wants a switch to the Premier League. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: Waiver wire: Start the second half strong with these pickups
content: As the season's second half gets ready to begin, here are the players you should claim off the waiver wire.

title: 'Rudy' or 'Hoosiers'? Indiana fan poll highlights SportsCenter's 50-in-50 Week 4 quiz
content: "SportsCenter" is continuing its journey across America -- and we're continuing to test your state-specific sports knowledge with our Week 4 quiz.

title: Agri income stagnates: Costs outpace gains for farmers; margins fall across crops
content: Indian farmers face a challenging situation with stagnant income and declining profit margins across major crops, as revealed by CACP data. While input costs have risen, the increase in farm income hasn't kept pace with rural inflation over the last decade. Consequently, profit margins have decreased for most crops, exacerbating the financial strain on farmers, especially those with small landholdings.

title: Op Sindoor: Pak’s Rahim Yar Khan base still shut; runway unusable till Aug 5
content: Indian missiles struck Pakistan's Rahim Yar Khan airbase during Operation Sindoor, rendering it non-operational for over two months. The strategic airbase, vital for Pakistan's southern air defense, sustained significant damage, as evidenced by repeated extensions of runway closure notices. Other airbases and a terror camp were also targeted, impacting Pakistan's military infrastructure.

title: Set up NIA courts or will give accused bail, SC warns govt; raps trial delays
content: The Supreme Court has expressed strong disapproval over delays in trials for NIA-investigated terrorism and heinous crime cases. It criticized the practice of designating existing courts for these cases, demanding the Union and Maharashtra governments establish new, exclusive special courts by September. Failure to comply may result in the courts considering bail for the accused due to trial delays.

title: MGNREGS mobile monitoring being fudged, govt tells states
content: The Ministry of Rural Development has directed states to improve monitoring of the National Mobile Monitoring System (NMMS) for MGNREGA, citing instances of misuse and manipulation. Discrepancies like irrelevant photo uploads and repeated worker photos raise concerns about accountability and potential financial irregularities. Congress has criticized the NMMS, demanding its withdrawal and reaffirmation of task-based payments.

title: Rahul Gandhi defends Robert Vadra against ED charges, Congress follows suit
content: Rahul Gandhi defended Robert Vadra against ED's chargesheet, denouncing it as a politically motivated witch-hunt by the BJP government. Congress launched a full-fledged defense, asserting Vadra's innocence and highlighting the absence of illegality in the land deal. A Delhi court has taken up the money laundering chargesheet against Vadra and others, scheduling it for document verification and consideration in July.

title: Coldplay concert viral video: Astronomer CEO caught on kiss cam; Musk reacts
content: A video of Astronomer CEO Andy Byron and HR head Kristin Cabot kissing at a Coldplay concert has gone viral, sparking online chatter dubbed "Coldplaygate." The incident, captured on a kiss cam, led to speculation about workplace relationships. Elon Musk reacted to a morphed apology tweet with a laughing emoji, further fueling the controversy.

title: 24 hours on, shooters of Bihar gangster still at large
content: Bihar police are hunting for five shooters involved in the brazen murder of gangster Chandan Mishra at a Patna hospital. Authorities have identified Tausif Badshah as the main gunman and suspect Onkarnath alias Sheru Singh, currently jailed in Bengal, orchestrated the crime due to suspicions that Mishra was informing police.

title: Monsoon session: BJP brass chalk out plan; Cong demands 2-day Pahalgam debate
content: Ahead of the Monsoon session, Union ministers strategized on key issues like Bihar's electoral rolls, the Pahalgam attack, and Operation Sindoor, amidst opposition pressure. Congress demands parliamentary discussion on the Pahalgam terror attack and seeks clarity on Operation Sindoor following claims made by Donald Trump. The INDIA bloc is set to meet online to strategize before the session begins.

title: Sachs has plan to keep junior talent; Memo says: will introduce early ...
content: Goldman Sachs is launching a new program to retain junior bankers amid increasing competition from private equity firms. The initiative offers select analysts an accelerated path to the Asset & Wealth Management (AWM) division after two years in investment banking. This strategy aims to provide an 'early entry point' for those interested in buyside careers.

title: Varma moves SC for quashing of inquiry report, questions in-house procedure validity
content: Justice Yashwant Varma has approached the Supreme Court to quash an inquiry report that found him guilty of possessing illicit cash at his residence. He challenges the constitutionality of the recommendation to remove him from his judgeship. Varma questions the in-house procedure, arguing it violates the constitutional power of Parliament to remove judges through impeachment.

title: Perplexity CEO says Google ‘a giant bureaucratic organization’
content: Perplexity's CEO, Aravind Srinivas, challenges Google's reliance on ads. He believes it hinders AI integration. Srinivas anticipates Google will adopt features from Perplexity's Comet browser. He also criticizes Google's organizational structure. Comet, an AI-powered browser, prioritizes users. It is currently available to premium Perplexity subscribers. A free version is planned. Srinivas aims to challenge Google's market dominance.

title: IIT-Kharagpur student found dead in hostel; 4th in 7 months
content: A fourth-year IIT-Kharagpur student, Ritam Mondal, was discovered dead in his hostel room. He had just returned from a summer break. Police suspect suicide and are investigating a possible family issue. The institute has formed a panel to investigate. This marks the fourth unnatural death at IIT-Kharagpur in recent months.

title: Balasore student told ex-principal about harassment 6 months ago
content: A probe into the self-immolation of a 20-year-old student in Balasore, Odisha, revealed she had accused her HoD of seeking sexual favors six months prior. College authorities were informed in June, but the HoD denied the allegations. Multiple investigations are underway, including those by UGC, higher education committees, and the crime branch.

title: Eye on Olympics, 3,000 sportsmen getting Rs 50k/mth: Amit Shah
content: Home Minister Amit Shah announced that India is bidding for the 2036 Olympics, Commonwealth Games, and Asian Games, aiming to integrate sports into daily life. The government is providing monthly stipends of Rs 50,000 to 3,000 athletes to prepare for the Olympics, with the goal of being among the top five nations in the medal tally.

title: Courtroom chaos erupts, Sharpe accuser’s lawyer blamed; secret postponement deal sparks outrage
content: The Shannon Sharpe sexual assault case saw a twist. The accuser's legal team missed a court date in Las Vegas. Attorney Tony Buzbee cited a mutual agreement for postponement. Judge Albertson expressed disappointment. Sharpe's attorney sought an extension. The next hearing is in September. Sharpe denies the charges. He calls it blackmail. The case involves public accusations and counter-accusations.

title: Luka Doncic exit buzz rises, Lakers’ LeBron treatment questioned; future hangs in the balance
content: Luka Doncic's future with the Los Angeles Lakers is uncertain as he approaches a player option in 2025-26. Tension arises from the Lakers' apparent shift towards prioritizing Doncic over LeBron James, potentially alienating the Slovenian star. Concerns grow that the Lakers' treatment of James could impact Doncic's trust and willingness to commit long-term.

title: Mariners mock Astronomer CEO as viral video sparks affair rumours
content: Following a viral Kiss Cam moment at a Coldplay concert, Astronomer's CEO, Andy Byron, and Chief of Human Resources, Kristin Cabot, were caught in a compromising position, sparking affair rumors. The Seattle Mariners then playfully capitalized on the situation with a meme featuring Cal Raleigh, inviting those in similar situations to contact them, further fueling the internet frenzy.

title: ESIC picks up 451 who failed to make UPSC’s final cut
content: The Employees’ State Insurance Corporation has hired 451 individuals. They were selected for insurance medical officer positions. The recruitment occurred through the UPSC’s Pratibha Setu portal. This portal contains a talent pool of candidates. These candidates cleared UPSC exams but weren't recommended. The Pratibha Setu initiative helps connect such candidates with employers. It offers opportunities to those with high qualifications.

title: Maha speaker makes NCP (SP), BJP MLAs apologise for scuffle
content: Following a clash between supporters of NCP (SP) MLA Jitendra Awhad and BJP MLA Gopichand Padalkar in Vidhan Bhavan, both leaders apologized as directed by Speaker Rahul Narwekar. Narwekar, taking a stern stance, has initiated measures including a privileges committee investigation for involved supporters and restricted access to the House during sessions.

title: Wipro to pay 2 lakh to ex-staffer for ‘defamatory’ relieving letter
content: Delhi High Court instructed Wipro to pay Rupees Two Lakh to an ex-employee. This was due to defamatory comments in the relieving letter. The court ordered Wipro to issue a new letter without the damaging statements. The original letter contained malicious remarks about the employee's conduct. The court emphasized that the remarks would harm the employee's career.

title: In blow to Lalu, SC refuses to stay trials in land-for jobs cases
content: Lalu Prasad faces setback as Supreme Court refuses to halt trial in land-for-job scam. CBI alleges Prasad secured land for railway jobs during his tenure as minister. Kapil Sibal argued political vendetta, but court allows trial to proceed. Court directs trial court to dispense with Prasad's presence. CBI filed chargesheet against Prasad, Rabri Devi, Tej Pratap Yadav, and Hema Yadav.

title: Corporal punishment gets Gujarat private tutor 6 months jail, Rs 1 lakh fine
content: In Vadodara, a private tutor, Jasbirsinh Chauhan, received a six-month jail sentence and a ₹1 lakh fine for severely injuring a 15-year-old student. Chauhan repeatedly slapped the boy, causing torn eardrums and bleeding, after the student missed classes. The father, Tejas Bhatt, filed a complaint leading to Chauhan's arrest in January 2020. The court convicted Chauhan after extensive legal proceedings.

title: UP man held for killing dog by slamming it on road
content: Naresh Kumar was arrested in Meerut for allegedly killing a community dog. He repeatedly slammed the dog onto a road in Sisoli. A video of the incident surfaced, sparking outrage. Sonia Gautam from Sarayu Animal Welfare Society filed a complaint. The FIR was registered at Mundali police station. Police are investigating previous similar crimes by the accused.

title: ED raids 22 Punjab de-addiction centres for illegal sale of drugs
content: Enforcement Directorate searched 22 de-addiction centers across Punjab. The searches happened due to illegal sale of drugs by these centers. Dr. Amit Bansal is the prime accused. He allegedly sold drugs from his de-addiction centers. Rupinder Kaur, a drug inspector, is also under investigation. She allegedly provided incorrect inspection reports.

title: Power outage turns life-saver for 50 kids on school bus
content: A power outage in a UP village miraculously saved 50 children after their school bus crashed into an electricity pole submerged in a water-filled ditch. While three children sustained injuries, potential electrocution was averted due to the outage. In a separate incident in the same district, a teacher and student died when an earth-moving vehicle collided with a school van.

title: 'Dubo ke maarenge': Raj Thackeray counters BJP MP's 'patak ke maarenge' remark
content: MNS chief Raj Thackeray retaliated against BJP MP Nishikant Dubey's threatening remark, daring him to visit Mumbai, escalating the language debate in Maharashtra. Thackeray warned of retaliation in Mumbai's waters, responding to Dubey's defense that Mumbai isn't exclusively for Marathis.

title: 3 killed while cleaning sugar mill’s effluent treatment unit
content: In a tragic incident at Uttam Sugar Mill in Bijnor's Barkatpur, three workers died while cleaning an effluent treatment plant. Supervisor Muneshwar Singh and two factory workers, Kapil Dev and Sopal Singh, succumbed to poisonous gases inside the tank. Another worker, Prabhat Kumar, was severely injured during a rescue attempt, prompting accusations of safety negligence against the factory management.

title: Bank manager in Baramati ends life citing ‘work pressure’
content: A 52-year-old bank manager from Prayagraj was discovered deceased in his Baramati office, Maharashtra, on Thursday. Police reported that a suicide note attributed the act to intense work pressure, though no individuals were named. The note urged the bank to alleviate employee stress, acknowledging their full commitment. He had also applied for voluntary retirement.

title: Buff Bagwell: WWE legend’s leg amputation stuns fans; years of pain end in major surgery
content: Marcus “Buff” Bagwell, a veteran WWE wrestler, had his leg amputated. The surgery happened on July 10, 2025. This was due to issues from a car accident in 2020. The accident in Georgia caused many injuries. Bagwell had almost 30 surgeries. Infections and pain continued. Doctors said the leg could not be saved. Bagwell wrestled for 34 years.

title: Dhangri massacre: NIA court frames charges against 2 terrorist harbourers
content: A special NIA court in Jammu has charged Nisar Ahmed and Mushtaq Hussain for aiding the 2023 Dhangri massacre perpetrators. Accused of providing shelter, food, and guidance to terrorists linked to Lashkar-e-Taiba, they face charges under IPC, UAPA, and Juvenile Justice Act. Both pleaded not guilty and sought trial after being accused of facilitating the attack that killed five villagers.

title: Sonya Curry shares heartfelt message, visits mother in hospital
content: Sonya Curry, mother of Stephen Curry, recently shared an emotional message on Instagram. She urged her followers to connect with their loved ones. Sonya emphasized the importance of spending quality time with family and friends. She encouraged fans to make an effort to visit and engage with people they care about. Sonya also launched a 'LOVE FIERCELY' challenge.

title: Thief posing as soldier kills soon-to-be groom in Srinagar
content: In Qazigund, Srinagar, a man posing as a soldier entered a house under the guise of a search operation. When a family member grew suspicious and confronted him, the imposter stabbed him to death. The accused, Naseer Ahmad Sheikh, has been arrested, and an investigation is underway to uncover the full details of the crime and any potential accomplices.

title: Every city must have chief information security officer, says home secretary
content: Union Home Secretary Govind Mohan emphasized the necessity for every city to appoint a Chief Information Security Officer (CISO) to safeguard data and systems against cyber threats. He urged states and city administrations to conduct regular security audits and build internal capacity for technology integration.

title: Road ministry to rank states on land buy speed to fast-track NH projects
content: The road transport ministry will soon rank states based on their 'ease of land acquisition' for national highway projects, addressing a major cause of delays. This initiative aims to prioritize projects in states that efficiently provide land, potentially using past performance as a benchmark. The Centre's reliance on state governments for land acquisition underscores the importance of this ranking system.

title: IND vs ENG: Karun Nair lambasted after his poor displays in England - 'Beautiful 30 is not expected from a No. 3'
content: Farokh Engineer has voiced concerns about Karun Nair's form in the Anderson-Tendulkar Trophy, citing his inability to convert starts into significant scores. With Nair averaging just 21.83, pressure mounts ahead of the Manchester Test. Engineer emphasized the need for substantial runs from the No. 3 position.

title: Debt, shame, vanishing dreams: Why millions in China feel trapped - and alone
content: China's economic growth masks a debt crisis. Many citizens face financial strain. They struggle with job insecurity and wage cuts. Some turn to side hustles for survival. A few share their debt stories online. The government offers subsidies. However, consumer sentiment remains low. Structural reforms are slow. The Chinese dream faces challenges. People prioritize survival over spending.

title: 'It was not ...': India batter responds to shoulder contact controversy after ICC fine
content: Indian batter Pratika Rawal addressed the controversy surrounding her shoulder contact with England players during the first Women's ODI, stating it was unintentional. The ICC fined her 10 percent of her match fee and issued one demerit point.

title: Coldplay ‘kiss cam’ scandal: Who is Andy Byron’s wife Megan Kerrigan?
content: Astronomer CEO Andy Byron's public embrace with his Chief People Officer at a Coldplay concert ignited a scandal, raising questions about workplace ethics and his marriage. Byron's wife, Megan Kerrigan, responded by removing his surname from social media, hinting at marital strain. The incident sparked widespread online reactions, with many supporting Kerrigan amidst affair rumors.

title: How conman duped big shots; Rs 2.75 cr ring, luxury liquor seized
content: Mangaluru police apprehended Roshan Saldana, accused of swindling crores from businessmen by posing as a wealthy entrepreneur. Saldana promised large loans, collected stamp duty and commissions, and then defrauded his victims. Police seized incriminating documents, jewelry, and excessive liquor from his residence, also revealing ₹40 crore in transactions over recent months.

title: 'Majboori hai': MP claims BJP may not win even 150 seats without PM Modi
content: BJP MP Nishikant Dubey emphasized PM Modi's crucial role in the party's electoral triumphs, asserting that without PM Modi's leadership, the BJP might struggle to secure even 150 seats. He highlighted how PM Modi's popularity has drawn in previously unsupportive voter segments, particularly among the poor.

title: Not against Hindi, but against forced imposition: Raj Thackeray
content: Referring to Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis’ statement that Hindi would be taught in schools at any cost, the MNS chief says everyone living in Maharashtra must learn Marathi

title: Farooq Abdullah presses for restoration of Statehood to J&K
content: Restoration of full Statehood is vital to uphold the dignity, identity, and autonomy of the region, says NC president

title: Madras High Court bids adieu to Chief Justice K.R. Shriram
content: He pays rich encomiums to his colleagues in the Bench, the Madras Bar and the staff of the High Court for their support during his tenure

title: NGT directs Karnataka govt. to act on Thenpennai river pollution, seeks action plan within a month
content: The bench expressed serious concern over the river’s condition, particularly in the stretch flowing from Karnataka into Tamil Nadu, where foaming, blackened water, and foul odour have been reported

title: Proper records help Kozhikode, Payyoli climb ranks in national cleanliness survey
content: The Kozhikode Corporation rose from 3,367 in 2023 to 70 this year, while Payyoli jumped from 3,707 to 596

title: How public sector incubator AIC is helping startups turn ideas into impact in Hyderabad
content: From zero-calorie sweets to lab-grown meat, biotech startups at the Atal Incubation Centre in Hyderabad are working on futuristic ideas; the centre, backed by CSIR-CCMB, provides lab access, expert mentoring and funding support to help young scientists turn research into real-world solutions

title: Suspended IFoS officer offers apology; Minister orders his suspension to be revoked
content: MoEFF is learnt to have communicated that the official’s suspension cannot be considered at this stage due to a ‘technical reason’

title: Chaitanya Baghel actively linked to proceeds of crime in liquor case: ED tells court
content: Probe agency tells PMLA court that Laxmi Narayan Bansal, another co-accused, had admitted that he handled more than ₹1,000 crore cash originating out of the liquor scam in association with Mr. Chaitanya Baghel, which are proceeds of crime

title: India does not subscribe to any unilateral measures, government says on EU sanctions
content: The European Union has announced a new package of sanctions aimed at Russia over its war against Ukraine. It also named Gujarat-based Nayara Energy’s Vadinar Refinery in which Russian energy firm Rosneft has a major stake.

title: Prashant Kishor leaves rally in a huff in Bihar, party says he suffered injury
content: According to a leader of the Jan Suraaj party, Mr. Kishor drove back to his Patna residence after receiving first aid locally.

title: Madras HC refuses to quash prosecution initiated by ECI against K.C. Veeramani for filing false affidavit
content: Justice P. Velmurugan dismisses the quash petition after ECI says, the former Minister had suppressed properties acquired abroad and also given false PAN numbers in his election affidavit

title: Six Maoists killed in encounter with security forces in Chhattisgarh’s Narayanpur
content: A gunfight broke out in the afternoon in the forest of Abujhmad region when joint teams of security forces were out on an operation, says Inspector General of Police (Bastar Range) P. Sundarraj

title: The Resistance Front was floated to deflect international sanctions against Pakistan: security officials
content: The Resistance Front has carried out terror attacks in Jammu & Kashmir’s Keran, Handwara, Sopore, Shopian, Anantnag, and Reasi with the latest one in Baisaran meadows of Pahalgam on April 22

title: INDIA bloc had ‘limited success’ due to ideological inconsistency, says CPI
content: Ahead of the party’s 25th Congress general secretary D. Raja released the draft political resolution

title: Narendra Modi’s Bihar visit was an empty bundle: Manoj Kumar Jha
content: Without naming anyone, Mr. Jha alleged that the government in Bihar is running from Delhi Durbar and those who were supposed to run Bihar are not even able to run their own house.

title: 94.68% of Bihar voters covered in electoral roll revision drive, says Election Commission
content: With just 7 days left for collection of forms, the ECI has begun sharing the list of forms that could not be collected with political parties

title: Six migrant workers from Bengal arrested in Punjab under cow slaughter law
content: Detentions come amid wider concerns over treatment of West Bengal migrants across States; Welfare Board steps in for legal aid

title: Nine get life imprisonment in Bengal for ‘digital arrest’ fraud
content: Victim lost ₹1 crore and was digitally arrested for almost seven days; convicts are part of a gang which defrauded over ₹100 crore from 108 people across India

title: Maharashtra clears proposal to rename Islampur as Ishwarpur
content: The renaming of Islampur to Ishwarpur is the latest in a series of name changes undertaken by the Maharashtra government; in recent years, the State has renamed Aurangabad to Chhatrapati Sambhajinagar and Osmanabad to Dharashiv, with the Centre’s approval

title: Coldplay's Jumbotron Captures- What Exactly? The Internet Has Its Theories
content: It started out as a routine bit of fun at a Coldplay concert: Lead singer Chris Martin asked the cameras to scan the crowd for his "Jumbotron Song," when he sings a few lines about the people the camera lands on.

title: Three Killed In Explosion At Los Angeles Police Training Facility
content: Three people died Friday in an explosion at a police training facility in Los Angeles, in what one local official called an accident.

title: Delhi Prepares Comprehensive Plan To Meet 2026-29 Electricity Demand Surge
content: Delhi's Rekha Gupta Government is developing a long-term plan to prevent blackouts in National Capital as city's peak electricity demand expected to surge in coming years.

title: Woman Shot Dead In UP After Court Hearing, Cops Suspect Husband
content: A 47-year-old woman was shot dead on Friday while returning from a court hearing in Agra in Uttar Pradesh, with police suspecting that her husband was involved in the murder due to the couple's ongoing legal dispute.

title: Trump Appointees Requested More Marble In Fed Building Renovation. It Now Faces Scrutiny
content: President Donald Trump has looked to the marble finishes and hefty price tag of the Federal Reserve headquarters to claim grounds to fire Chair Jerome Powell.

title: "Yeh Andar Ki Baat Hai": Uddhav Thackeray On D Fadnavis' 'Offer'
content: Uddhav Thackeray has responded to an 'offer' by Maharashtra Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis that has sparked huge speculation.

title: Zelensky Says Peace Talk With Russia Need "More Momentum"
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said on Friday that peace negotiations with Russia needed "more momentum" and that he had asked new National Security and Defence Council secretary Rustem Umerov to "intensify the negotiation track".

title: Gulf Air Orders 12 New Boeing And 787 Dreamliners
content: US aviation giant Boeing on Thursday signed a contract worth billions of dollars to sell 12 787 Dreamliners.

title: Messages Being Conveyed Through Punches, Kicks: D Fadnavis On Assembly Clash
content: Expressing concern over the scuffle between supporters of two MLAs on the Maharashtra Assembly premises on Thursday, Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis said that, instead of discussions, messages are being conveyed through punches and kicks.

title: Probe Agency ED Seizes Properties Worth Rs 7.31 Crore In Alleged Call Centre Scam
content: The Directorate of Enforcement Directorate (ED) has provisionally attached immovable properties worth Rs 7.31 crore located in Ludhiana and Mohali.

title: US Air Travel On Cusp Of New Era: Liquid And Shoe Rules May Soon Relax
content: When limits on liquids were introduced at TSA checkpoints across the country in 2006, bins overflowed with bottled water, toothpaste, shaving cream and so much more.

title: Trump's Team Seeks Release Of Epstein's Testimony In Sex Trafficking Case
content: Donald Trump's administration said it would seek the release of grand jury testimony related to Jeffrey Epstein on Friday, as the US president sought to dispel lingering political fallout over his team's handling of the sex trafficking case.

title: Actor Sangeeta Bijlani's Pune Farmhouse Vandalised, Items Stolen: Cops
content: A theft has been reported at film actor Sangeeta Bijlani's farmhouse in Maval in Pune district, a police official said on Friday.

title: Uma Bharti Demands CBI Probe Into How Her Name Appeared In Vyapam Scam
content: The spectre of Madhya Pradesh's most controversial scam - Vyapam - has once again returned to haunt the political landscape.

title: With 5,000 Government Cases Pending, Delhi Pushes For Litigation Overhaul
content: Chief Minister Rekha Gupta on Friday flagged the surging number of pending court cases involving the government and called for a complete revamp of how litigation is handled, in a move aimed at clearing the city's mounting legal clutter.

title: Kremlin Says Trump Ukraine Pressure Wont End US-Russia Talks
content: Kremlin said on Friday that it did not believe that a tougher stance US President Donald Trump has adopted towards Russia over its war in Ukraine means the end of US-Russia talks aimed at reviving their battered ties.

title: Congress Protest March In Srinagar Tomorrow Over J&K Statehood
content: After its letter to Prime Minister Narendra Modi, the Congress party is launching a campaign to put pressure on the central government to introduce a bill in the upcoming Parliament session for the restoration of statehood for Jammu and Kashmir.

title: Jagan Reddy Party MP Likely To Surrender Tomorrow In Andhra Liquor 'Scam'
content: YSR Congress MP PV Midhun Reddy is expected to surrender before the Special Investigation Team (SIT) on Saturday morning in connection with the alleged multi-crore Andhra Pradesh liquor scam.

title: University Expels Bangladeshi Student Over Clash On Serving Non-Veg Food On Shivratri
content: A Bangladeshi scholar was expelled from the South Asian University and a fine of Rs. 5000 was imposed on the students' mess secretary for serving non-vegetarian food on Maha Shivratri, officials said on Friday.

title: RSS-affiliated farmers’ body calls for cancellation of permission to test GM maize at Punjab Agricultural University
content: Raising serious objections to the plan, a delegation headed by BKS Punjab chief Ravinder Singh Dhillon submitted a memorandum to the Vice Chancellor of Punjab Agricultural University

title: Bihar Cabinet gives nod to provide 125 units of free electricity to 1.67 crore power consumers
content: No fixed charge or other charges to be levied on those consuming up to 125 units; consumers using above 125 units will continue to get subsidised rate

title: BMRCL employees’ union opposes plan to outsource metro train operators
content: However, a senior BMRCL official clarified that the outsourcing decision has been taken primarily to address the current shortage of trained staff.

title: ‘Supreme Court of Karnataka’: To prove misuse, Centre opens fake account on X
content: Solicitor-General shows verified X handle to High Court; X Corp. calls move improper, says account now suspended

title: Police intensify search for District Congress Committee  member accused in land grab case in Thiruvananthapuram
content: Ananthapuri Manikandan, a vendor, is suspected to have masterminded a fraudulent property transfer at Kowdiar

title: Now, FIR can be registered in any police station in Tamil Nadu even for crimes outside jurisdiction
content: Such FIRs must be transferred electronically and physically to the competent police station within 24 hours

title: AAP no longer part of INDIA bloc: Party MP Sanjay Singh
content: AAP distances itself from INDIA bloc, questioning Congress’ leadership and emphasising strong Opposition role in upcoming Parliament session

title: This Kochi youngster handmade a Lamborghini Huracan LP 610-4 from scratch
content: Bibin Chacko spent three years fabricating a scaled down Lamborghini Huracan, which he had only seen before in pictures

title: Lack of fast-track courts to try cases of violence against women an issue: expert
content: Workshop on ‘Strengthening institutional mechanisms combating violence against women and girls’ held

title: After U.S. labels The Resistance Front as global terror outfit, China calls for stronger regional anti-terror cooperation
content: “China calls on regional countries to enhance counterterrorism cooperation and jointly maintain regional security and stability,” Foreign Ministry spokesperson Lin Jian said

title: Andhra Pradesh hosts first South India regional conference on social audit
content: Andhra Pradesh Panchayat Raj Principal Secretary Shashibhushan Kumar highlights the State’s landmark initiative of livestreaming mandal-level public audits on YouTube, making it the first State in the country to do so

title: Local body polls: State Election Commission to hold meeting of political parties on Saturday
content: State Delimitation Commission is hoping to wind up the delimitation process by the middle of August. Launched last year, the mammoth exercise is in the third and final phase, where the wards of the district panchayats are being reorganised

title: Right-wing group storms Ghaziabad eateries over sale of meat during Sawan
content: Congress, Samajwadi Party term incident a violation of citizens’ rights; question inaction by authorities

title: T.N. government establishes Chennai Institute of Journalism
content: It will offer a postgraduate diploma programme in journalism from the 2025-26 academic year. Notification for admission will be issued soon

title: Quantum Valley initiative will change the face of Andhra Pradesh, says Vijayawada MP
content: The government is not only focused on job creation but also on promoting entrepreneurship through the Society for Employment and Entrepreneurship Development in Andhra Pradesh: Kesineni Sivanath

title: National seminar on diversity of traditional knowledge systems to be held
content: KSHEC governing body meeting held. Meeting decides to expedite transition of remaining universities to K-REAP software system

title: Raise important issues in Parliament, mobilise maximum funds from  Centre, Naidu tells TDP MPs
content: He wants them to focus on Minimum Support Price for various crops, utilisation of the Godavari and Krishna river waters and the support required by A.P. for industrial development

title: Jagan is trying to create panic among investors, alleges A.P. I&PR Minister Parthasarathy
content: The YSRCP president has neither administrative skills nor concern for the future of the State, as his political approach is solely for personal gain, he alleges

title: Second half sees Ceddanne Rafaela at second base?
content: fantasy baseball buzz file aims to provide fantasy managers with the intel they need as news breaks around MLB . a mild 71 degrees with wind blowing slightly in could help keep a pair of potent lineups in check . the only game in jeopardy is the Washington Nationals hosting the San Diego Padres .

title: Joel Embiid sees you
content: Kendrick Perkins: Embiid feels pressured to play through injury showcases trust issues . he says he's leaning back on a couch that seemed spacious until he eased his long body onto it . his son, Arthur, peeks around corners from the hallway to see what we're up to .

title: Our latest intel on MLB trade deadline rumors, Tucker's free agency and more
content: the baseball world gathered in Atlanta for the 2025 MLB draft , home run Derby and all-star game this week . our reporters were there talking to execs, coaches, agents, scouts, players and other team sources .

title: Sights and sounds from the second round of the 2025 Open Championship
content: the second round of the 153rd Open Championship has ended at Royal Portrush Golf Course in northern Ireland . Scottie Scheffler takes control of the proceedings with a 7-under performance Friday, bringing a 10-under into the weekend . pic.twitter.com/f33PdsVDmG Making his move .

title: How to approach potential Rashee Rice suspension
content: fantasy football buzz file aims to provide fantasy managers with the intel they need as news breaks around the NFL . fantasy managers should brace for the likelihood Rice will miss a noticeable portion of the 2025 season . the odds of him serving a multigame suspension have significantly increased .

title: 'Incident' at LA Sheriff County training facility: 3 killed; Pam Bondi calls it ‘horrific’
content: seasoned journalists and passionate writers tirelessly sift through the vast tapestry of global events to bring you the latest news and diverse perspectives round the clock . we strive to keep you informed about the ever-evolving world and deliver a nuanced understanding of international affairs to our readers .

title: Dear 'Diamond': Letters to Dustin Poirier on the eve of his final UFC fight
content: Dustin Poirier will make his final walk to the UFC Octagon against Max Holloway . the 36-year-old says he has decided to walk away to preserve his long-term health . poirier is considered one of the top lightweights in the world, ranked no. 5 in ESPN's divisional rankings .

title: Why Drake Maye can be a top-10 QB in 2025
content: in 11 starts from Week 6 to Week 17, Drake Maye threw for 2,254 yards, 15 touchdowns and 10 interceptions . that translated to an average of 16.0 fantasy points per game in those starts, which would have ranked just outside the top 12 quarterbacks over a full season . Maye has all the makings of a top-10 fantasy quarterback .

title: What we're hearing in the transfer window: Sancho, Rashford headed to Juve?
